post.summary: Get the info about a share

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: Maximum depth to get info about

get.summary: Get shares of the current user

parameters.name: shared_with_me
parameters.description: Only get shares with the current user

parameters.name: reshares
parameters.description: Only get shares by the current user and reshares

parameters.name: subfiles
parameters.description: Only get all shares in a folder

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Get shares for a specific path

404.description: The folder was not found or is inaccessible

parameters.name: shareWith
parameters.description: The entity this should be shared with

parameters.name: sendPasswordByTalk
parameters.description: Send the password for the share over Talk

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Label for the share (only used in link and email)

403.description: Creating the share is not allowed

get.summary: Get all shares relative to a file, including parent folders shares rights

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path all shares will be relative to

get.summary: Get all shares that are still pending
Get a specific share by id

parameters.name: sendPasswordByTalk
parameters.description: New condition if the password should be send over Talk

parameters.name: publicUpload
parameters.description: New condition if public uploading is allowed

parameters.name: hideDownload
parameters.description: New condition if the download should be hidden

400.description: Share could not be updated because the requested changes are invalid

403.description: Missing permissions to update the share
Missing permissions to delete the share

get.summary: Get a list of all deleted shares

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Limit amount of search results per page

parameters.name: lookup
parameters.description: If a global lookup should be performed too

get.summary: Get a list of accepted remote shares
Get list of pending remote shares
Get info of a remote share
